facts.seriesTitle: Population below international poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line declined from 49.8 % in 1991 to 13.3% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Employed population below international poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2013, 9.7 % of the country's workers and their families were living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line declined from 31.9 % in 2005 to 23.4% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was 6.1 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are moderately or severely stunted (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2014, 18.8 % of children under 5 years of age had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are moderately or severely overweight
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under 5 years of age decreased from 4.45 % in 2003 to 2.64% in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 634 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 319 per 100,000 live births in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under 5 years of age fell from 99.2 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 49.3 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population
facts.fact_text: In 2017, there were about 0.68 people in every 100,000 uninfected population that became newly infected with HIV.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 89.33 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Gender parity index for achievement in mathematics by the end of primary education
facts.fact_text: The gender parity index for achievement in mathematics at the end of primary education was 0.94 in 2013 , meaning 94.0 girls per 100 boys achieved at least a minimum proficiency level in mathematics.

facts.seriesTitle: Gender parity index for achievement in reading by the end of primary education
facts.fact_text: The gender parity index for achievement in reading at the end of primary education was 1 in 2016 , meaning 100.0 girls per 100 boys achieved at least a minimum proficiency level in reading.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2014, 20.7 % of women between 20 to 24 years of age reported having been married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 9 % in 2000 to 13.09% in 2019.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed drinking water services (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 36.41 % of the population used a "safely managed" drinking water service—an improved source located on premises, available when needed and free from contamination

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 30.6 % in 1993 to 79% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 25 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (percent)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita increased from 1.67 % in 2000 to 5.79% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 5.47 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 6.94 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate of population 15 years of age and older
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate increased from 4.6 % in 2006 to 6.8% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kg per constant 2010 US dollars)
facts.fact_text: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP were approximately 0.12 kg in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2010, investment in research and development (R&D) stood at 0.38 % of GDP, up from 0.23 % in 2007

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by at least a 2G mobile network (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 96.79 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of urban population living in slums (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the urban population living in slums declined from 65.5 % in 1990 to 30.4% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameter (PM2.5) was about 31.95 micrograms per cubic metre. This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 5.47 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 6.94 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 0.1 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of land area covered by forest was approximately 41.03 % in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 85.61 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population
facts.fact_text: In 2017, the intentional homicide rate was 2.11 per 100,000 population.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2014, there were about 70.5 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances as a proportion of total GCP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, the inflow of personal remittances was 5.99 % of GDP, up from 0.1 % in 1990

facts.seriesTitle: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (percent)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services declined from 36.45 % in 1990 to 10.09% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 0.2 % of the population,nearly no coverage in 2004.
